actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 10 percent tax credit for investments in pollution control facilities.
short_title: Pollution Control Investment Tax Credit Act of 1990

summary.text: Pollution Control Investment Tax Credit Act of 1990 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an investment tax credit for pollution control facilities.

titles.title: Pollution Control Investment Tax Credit Act of 1990
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 10 percent tax credit for investments in pollution control facilities.
